headline: Space shuttle Endeavour rests in LA before final journey to California science museum in pictures
text: The Over Land Transporter (OLT) being mated to the space shuttle Endeavour not long after Endeavour was demated from the NASA 747 Shuttle Carrier Aircraft (SCA) at LAX. Photograph: Nasa/Bill Ingalls/EPA       The shuttle carrier aircraft, with space shuttle Endeavour mounted on top, is guided under cranes and trusses in preparation for de-mating Photograph: Paul E Alers/AP       Endeavour flies over the Golden Gate bridge Photograph: John Storey/Nasa/EPA       Endeavour at the Hollywood sign Photograph: Rex Features       Endeavour flies over the LA Coliseum Photograph: Jim Ross/AP       Space shuttle Endeavour at LAX. Photograph: Keystone/Zuma/Rex Features       Endeavour touches down at LAX Photograph: Reed Saxon/AP
